name: swagger-codegen-staticdocs-rig
description: This is an ongoing development rig for working with mustache generator found in swagger-codegen The object is to generate docs based on data from swagger-codegen.

scripts.compass_build: bundle exec compass clean && bundle exec compass compile
scripts.swagger_make: npm run copy_across && ( cd $npm_package_swagger_path && mvn clean && ./$npm_package_swagger_script )
scripts.pages: (git checkout gh-pages && git merge develop -m 'merge in develop' && npm run compass_build && git add -f build/app.css && git commit -m 'force commit build/app.css' && git push -f)

author: Josh S Ponelat
